name: priority:high
description: Issue (or PR) is urgent, and should be resolved at the next patch release

name: priority:low
description: Issue (or PR) is not critical, and may be resolved at next major release

name: priority:medium
description: Issue (or PR) is important, but may be resolved at next minor release

name: satus:refused
description: Issue will not be resolved, or PR will not be merged

name: status:accepted
description: Issue will be resolved, or PR will be merged

name: status:duplicate
description: Issue marked as duplicate

name: status:fixed
description: Issue has been fixed

name: status:merged
description: PR has been merged

name: status:needs-changes
description: PR needs changes before it will be merged

name: status:pending
description: Issue (or PR) has been submitted, but has not yet been reviewed

name: status:under-review
description: Issue (or PR) marked as under review by the maintainer

name: type:bug
description: Issue (or PR) which reports (or fixes) a bug

name: type:dependency
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) changes to code dependencies

name: type:docs
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) changes to documentation

name: type:feature
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) a new feature, or changes to a feature

name: type:other
description: Issue (or PR) which reports (or fixes) some other type of issue

name: type:performance
description: Issue (or PR) which reports (or fixes) a performance issue

name: type:refactor
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) a refactor of a section of code

name: type:remove
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) the removal of a section of code

name: type:rewrite
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) a rewrite of a section of code

name: type:security
description: Issue (or PR) which reports (or fixes) a security issue

name: type:test
description: Issue (or PR) which requests (or applies) new tests, or changes to tests
